item.title: Revisiting Over-Smoothness in Text to Speech
item.description: Audio Samples All of the audio samples use Parallel WaveGAN (PWG) as vocoder. Audio Samples for Table 2 Audio Samples for different methods for simplifying data distributions for TTS. This type was introduced into England by Wynkyn de Worde, Caxtons successor. GT GT (PWG) MAE FreqAR TimeAR FastSpeech 2 Most of Caxtons own types are of an earlier character, though they also much resemble Flemish or Cologne letter.
